short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert a number to roman numeral and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simplest extension that you need to easily convert a number into roman numeral and vice versa.  The UI is very simple and user friendly.
